column4: how do I view the kernel source code?  does it come with Ubuntu?  do i just need to download it?  if so, from where?
why do you need it? http://kernel.org
1) ask before pm. 2) http://kernel.org is the place to get current linux kernel sources. apt-cache search linux kernel & apt-get source might help with the ubuntu-specific configurations of it
you just type my name before the message.
